sentences.sContent: I am starting to sense that maybe I and people like me are to blame because it is we, the Irish people, who are paying with our jobs, livelihoods, health care and education.
sentences.sContent_eng: I am starting to sense that maybe I and people like me are to blame because it is we, the Irish people, who are paying with our jobs, livelihoods, health care and education.
sentences.sCn: 我开始感觉到或许就是我以及像我这样的人，该受责备，因为就是我们，让爱尔兰人民，正在为我们的工作、生活、医疗卫生和教育买单。

sentences.sContent: On the other hand, the Irish are also right to be suspicious of intentions in Brussels and Berlin.
sentences.sContent_eng: On the other hand, the Irish are also right to be suspicious of intentions in Brussels and Berlin.
sentences.sCn: 另一方面，爱尔兰对于柏林和布鲁塞尔的意图持怀疑态度也是有道理的。

synos.tran: 爱尔兰；爱尔兰人；爱尔兰语

phrases.pCn: n. 爱尔兰咖啡（一种鸡尾酒）

trans.tranCn: 爱尔兰人(的),爱尔兰语（的）
